definition: to congratulate respectfully/to wish good luck and success (esp. to a superior)/with best wishes (in writing)
respectful
surname Zhu
to wish/to express good wishes/to pray/(old) wizard

sentences.english: At this festive occasion, wish business was flourishing.
sentences.chinese: 值此佳節之際，恭祝事業蒸蒸日上。

sentences.english: To wish you joy with this holy season. Wishing every hrequestinesswillregularly be around you.
sentences.chinese: 恭祝新年禎祥，幸福和歡樂與你同在。

sentences.english: On the occasion of the Spring Festival, good business.
sentences.chinese: 值此新春佳節之際，恭祝事業蒸蒸日上。

sentences.english: Happy festival of lanterns (Yuan Xiao) and Happy Eastern Valentine.
sentences.chinese: 恭祝各位元宵節快樂，東方情人節快樂。

sentences.english: The knot, to wish happiness with.
sentences.chinese: 喜結連理日，恭祝幸福隨。

sentences.english: To wish you joy at this holy season. Wishing every happiness will always be with you.
sentences.chinese: 恭祝新年吉祥，幸福和歡樂與你同在。
